channel.title: Clustering on Nicholas Chin Wei Lun
channel.description: Recent content in Clustering on Nicholas Chin Wei Lun

item.title: Customer Segmentation
item.description: In this project, we use recency, frequency and monetary (RFM) to analyse customer purchases from the United Kingdom. We select the number of clusters based on an elbow plot and will apply k-means clustering to segment the customers into 3 different groups: small spending customers, middle spending customers and large spending customers.
